snakePop.step1: Select the difficulty level and start the game.
snakePop.step2: Use the arrow keys on your keyboard to change the direction of the snake's movement.
snakePop.step3: Lead the snake to the food. When the snake eats the food, it will grow in length.
snakePop.step4: Avoid the snake hitting the walls and its own body.
snakePop.step5: The speed of the snake depends on the selected difficulty level.
